column1: MRI image size (128, 256, 1) of the head of a man of 37 years old in weighting T2, with sagittal section. We observe slice n°154 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. We observe the following characteristics: the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 5061.1816 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 5212.7930 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 160.8398 mm³, the temporal horn of right lateral ventricle of volume 9.2285 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 410.0098 mm³, the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1556.9824 mm³, the right putamen of volume 381.0059 mm³, the right globus pallidus of volume 101.5137 mm³, the right hippocampus of volume 264.9902 mm³, the right amygdala of volume 129.1992 mm³, the right ventral diencephalon of volume 17.1387 mm³ and the right vessel of volume 5.2734 mm³.
